tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EventSchedule (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    event_date DATE,
    event_time TIME,
    event_location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE TicketSales (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    ticket_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    number_of_tickets INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES EventSchedule(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TicketSales (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    ticket_price DECIMAL(8, 2),
    ticket_quantity INT,
    sale_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SeatingArrangements (
    seat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    seat_number INT,
    section VARCHAR(50),
    is_reserved BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE ticket_sales (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    ticket_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    ticket_quantity INT,
    ticket_status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE seating_arrangements (
    seating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    row_number INT,
    seat_number INT,
    seat_type VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE match_results (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    wrestler_id INT,
    match_duration TIME,
    winner_id INT
);
